column2: "Na ɔkɔm no mu yɛɛ dzen wɔ asaase no do."

column3: aber a wowiee eburow a wɔdze fi Egypt bae no dzi no
column4: hɔn egya see hɔn dɛ
column6: hom nkɔtɔ edziban kakra mbrɛ hɛn."

column3: banyin no paa mu ara kaa kyerɛɛ hɛn dɛ
column4: Hom runnhu m’enyim
column5: gyedɛ hom nua no ka hom ho."

column2: "Sɛ ebɛma hɛn nua no nye hɛn akɔ a
column3: nna yɛbɔkɔ na yɛakɔtɔ edziban abrɛ wo:"

column2: "na sɛ ennkɛma ɔaka hɛn ho dze a
column3: ɔno yɛronnkɔ: osiandɛ banyin no see hɛn dɛ
column4: Mma hom nnsi m’enyim
column5: gyedɛ hom nua no ka hom ho."

column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom nye me dzi no bɔn dɛm
column4: dɛ hom kaa kyerɛɛ banyin no dɛ hom wɔ nua bi so?"

column3: ɔbarimba no bisaa hɛn ntsɛmara wɔ hɛnara hɛnho
column4: nye hɛn ebusuafo ho
column6: Ana hom egya da ho tse ase? Hom wɔ nua bi so a? Na mbrɛ nsɛm yi tse no ara na hɛn so yeyii no ano. Ana hɛn so yenyim dɛ ɔreyɛ na ɔase dɛ

column3: Ma abofra no nye me nkɔ
column4: na yɛbɔsoɛr na yɛakɔ; ama yeenya nkwa

column2: "Mibedzi no ho egyinamu; hwehwɛ no me nsamu: sɛ mammfa no ammbrɛ wo
column3: na mammfa no emmbegyina w’enyim a
column4: ɔno wɔmma asodzi no nka mo kɔn mu daa:"

column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ara a yɛakɔ aba mpɛn ebien."

column2: "Na hɔn egya Israel see hɔn dɛ
column3: Sɛ mbrɛ ɔtse nye yi a
column4: ɔno hom nyɛ yi; hom mfa asaase yi do ndzepa a oye no bi ngu hom ndzɛmba mu
column12: "na hom mfa sika fofor nkitsa; na sika a wɔdze sanee maa hom a wɔdze hyehyɛɛ hom nkotoku ano no
column13: ɔno so hom mfa nkitsa bio; bi a enyi na oduaa do."

column3: na wɔnsoɛr nkɔ banyin no hɔ bio:"

column2: "na Otumfo Nyankopɔn mma banyin no nhu hom mbɔbɔr
column3: ama oeegyaa hom nua kor no nye Benjamin ama hom. Na emi dze
column4: sɛ me mba fi me nsa a

column3: na wɔfaa sika fofor siaan ho
column4: nye Benjamin so; na wɔsoɛree kɔr Egypt

column2: "Na aber a Josef hun dɛ Benjamin ka hɔn ho no
column3: ɔsee ne fie somfopanyin no dɛ
column4: Fa mbanyin yi kɔ fie
column6: na yɛ edziban; na mbanyin yi nye me bedzidzi ewiaber yi."

column2: "Na panyin no yɛɛ dɛ mbrɛ Josef see no ara; na ɔdze nkorɔfo no kɔr Josef fie."

column3: osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn akɔ Josef ne fie ntsi; na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Sika a wɔsanee dze hyehyɛɛ hɛn nkotoku mu asɔpɔn no ntsi na wɔdze hɛn aba fie yi; ama ɔaahwehwɛ biribi egyina do

column2: "Na wopiin Josef ne fie somfopanyin no nkyɛn wɔ fi no n’abowano
column4: "na wɔsee dɛ
column6: yɛbaa ha bɔtɔɔ edziban asɔpɔn no ampa:"

column3: aber a yedur asoɛe
column4: na yɛsansaan hɛn nkotoku ano no
column7: hɛn nyinara hɛn sika hyehyɛ hɛn nkotoku ano
column8: hɛn sika mbrɛ ɔtow ara pɛ: na yɛdze asan aba."

column2: "Na yɛdze sika fofor so aba a yɛdze robɔtɔ edziban: yennyim nyia ɔdze hɛn sika no hyehyɛɛ hɛn nkotoku mu."

column3: Asomdwee nka hom
column4: mma hom nnsuro: hom Nyankopɔn
column6: na ɔama hom ehutudze wɔ hom nkotoku mu: me nsa kaa hom sika no. Na okeyii Simeon brɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na banyin no dze nkorɔfo no kɔr Josef fie
column3: na ɔmaa hɔn nsu
column4: na wɔhohoor hɔn anan ho; na ɔmaa hɔn nsoasopɔnkɔ no edziban."

column2: "Na wɔyɛɛ akyɛdze no krado dze tweɔɔn Josef ne mbae a ɔbaa ewiaber no: osiandɛ wɔtsee dɛ woribedzidzi wɔ hɔ."

column3: wɔdze akyɛdze a okitsa hɔn nsamu no kɔr dan mu kɛmaa no
column4: na wɔkɔbɔɔ hɔn mu adze wɔ famu maa no."

column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Ana hom egya akɔdaa a hom kaa no ho asɛm no
column5: no ho ye? Ana ɔda ho tse ase?"

column3: W’akowaa hɛn egya no ho ye
column4: ɔda ho tse ase. Na wɔbɔɔ hɔn tsir adze

column3: na ohun no nua Benjamin
column4: ne na ba no
column6: Ana hom nua kuma a hom kaa no ho asɛm kyerɛɛ me no
column7: ɔno nye yi a? Na ɔsee dɛ

column2: "Na Josef no ho hiahiaa no; osiandɛ ne yamu hyehyee no wɔ no nua no ho; na ɔhwehwɛɛ beebi a obosuma esu; na ɔkɔr ne pia mu
column3: na okosui wɔ hɔ."
na opuei; na ɔhyɛɛ noho do
column4: na ɔsee dɛ

column3: na wɔdze hɔndze sisii fa
column4: na wɔdze Egyptfo a wɔnye no dzidzi no hɔndze sisii fa; osiandɛ Egyptfo nnye Hebriwfo nndzidzi; na ɔyɛ ekyiwadze ma Egyptfo."

column3: abakan no dɛ mbrɛ ne panyin tse
column4: nye ekumaba no dɛ mbrɛ n’ekumaba tse: na ɔyɛɛ nkorɔfo no nwanwa wɔ hɔn mu."

column2: "Na oyiyii edziban ma wɔdze fii n’enyim maa hɔn: na Benjamin dze n’edziban no boor hɔn nyinara hɔndze do mpɛn enum. Na wɔnomee
column3: na hɔn nyinara hɔn enyi gyee."
